entities.name: shell cottage
entities.description: Shell Cottage is described as a place where Harry and others are staying. It is mentioned that they glanced back at it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who made the comment about Shell Cottage not being his type, but he'll do. He is also the one who suggested going.

relationships.description: Harry and others glanced back at Shell Cottage, indicating that they are aware of its location and have been there before.
